description: This file provides utility functions for displaying toast notifications related to API success, error, and informational messages. It includes functions for showing success, info, and error toasts, parsing errors into human-readable messages, and trimming long details for concise display.

methods.name: showApiSuccess
methods.description: Displays a success toast message with optional details and deduplication key.

methods.name: showApiInfo
methods.description: Displays an informational toast message with deduplication support.

methods.name: showApiError
methods.description: Displays an error toast message, parsing error details and supporting deduplication.

methods.name: parseError
methods.description: Converts an error object or value into a concise, human-readable string.
